tourist_safety.description: Tourist areas well-patrolled, good infrastructure for visitors

safety.notes: Generally safe for tourists with normal precautions. Tourist areas well-patrolled but some political instability exists.

humidity.description: Moderate humidity levels, particularly comfortable in winter months

weather_stability.description: Very stable during winter months, predictable conditions

winter_climate.notes: Ideal winter weather. East coast beaches perfect during this period. Low humidity, minimal rain.

accessibility.description: Major cities have good facilities, rural areas more limited

insurance_options.description: International insurance accepted at private hospitals

emergency_services.description: Response times vary significantly by region

healthcare.notes: Recommend private hospitals in major cities for serious issues. Travel insurance advised.

groceries_monthly.description: Mix of local and imported products available

education.description: International schools available in major cities

family_amenities.notes: Rich in cultural and outdoor activities. Many family-friendly resorts and activities.

transportation.description: Various options available but can be challenging

summary.overall_notes: Sri Lanka offers an excellent winter escape with perfect weather during January-February. The country provides a great balance of affordability, cultural experiences, and natural beauty. While there are some infrastructure challenges, the low cost of living and rich experiences make it an attractive option for a creative family. Best suited for families comfortable with some adventure and willing to adapt to a different pace of life.
